attributes.action: ensure that every citizen in this United Kingdon owes his allegience to this land above all and that any person who does not would be considered as a traitor and should be deported or lose all rights accorded to a  British citizen.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No person residing in the Uk shouls be allowed to act against this country, whether verbally or indeed in action.  Every Person residing in the UK should learn English as a first language and respect its laws and its traditions.  No person residing in the UK, if they are to be accepted as part of this great nation should be allowed to owe allegiance to any country, ideology or creed that will undermine its cohesion.

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several that already exist please consider signing those http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=immigrant
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
